And I can’t even remove it because the stickers are so strong.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Un breakable, stick-on mirrors really stick.', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love these mirrors. A set of 4. I put up 3 in my closet and another one in the laundry room. They stick on easily in a minute or so. Since they are unbreakable like plexiglass, they would be good anywhere there is a concern about broken glass such as a playroom or mud room.These are for casual use , reflection is a bit wavy from afar, and not like a high quality mirror, but for price and functionality they are very good. I put mine in my walk in closet arranged vertically a few months ago. No problem with them coming loose so far.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars It's great!...with the correct adhesive", 'author': 'Nicklaus Flow', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I bought this since it was durable and fairly simple to install, which I'm glad to say the product lives up to those descriptors. But, I ordered this twice, since 4 in a pack seems like *just* not enough for the size of these things. First time, product was great! It came with 32 adhesive pads, you're meant to place 8 on the back of each mirror. This was fine, the adhesive is really strong and I've never had an issue with the mirrors using this kind of adhesive. The problem is when I ordered again. They seemed to have sent a slightly different product, or maybe a different version of the same product? The second time around, the mirrors were *ever* so slightly smaller (not enough to be noticeable from a distance, but still), and the adhesive was different. This time, the back of each mirror was covered with a pre-applied adhesive that would let the mirror attach to the wall directly. Problem is, this version of the product is pretty mediocre. The adhesive back is just not that strong, and 2 out of the 4 mirrors that use this have a lot of trouble staying attached to the wall, so much so that I've resorted to using thumbtacks to support them when they inevitably peel off. These simple little mirrors are great and do what they need to do, but you should pray that you only get the kind that comes with the adhesive pads rather than the much much worse subpar grade school glue that seems to be used on the newer mirrors.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, But Not Without Flaws: UNBREAKABL MIRO Shower Mirror Review', 'author': 'RavenBlueFeather', 'rating': 3, 'content': "I've been using the UNBREAKABLE MIRO Shower Mirror for a few months now, and it has its ups and downs. Let's dive into the details.On the positive side, this small, hand-sized, portable mirror is incredibly convenient for shaving.It's easy to hang in the bathroom or pack on the go, which is a huge plus for someone like me who values portability.The quality of the plastic used in its construction is impressive; I can vouch for its unbreakable claim, as it has survived a few accidental drops without a scratch.However, here's where the mirror falls short.It's not scratch-resistant, so over time, you'll have to contend with the inevitable scratches that accumulate, which can affect the overall visibility.Additionally, it tends to fog up rather easily during showers, which can be quite frustrating.Despite these drawbacks, the UNBREAKABLE MIRO Shower Mirror does serve its primary purpose well, making shaving more accessible and hassle-free.If you can overlook the occasional scratches and fogging, it's still a decent product.Just be aware of its limitations before making your purchase.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars My twins appreciate this', 'author': 'Meka Arpege', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Was looking for something like this because they were complaining they can’t see when brushing their teeth the mirror is too high even with the step stool this is great', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars It's Unbreakable", 'author': 'CGA', 'rating': 5, 'content': "For my use I needed to bend it. It bent and didn't break.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars What a nightmare!', 'author': 'Distance', 'rating': 1, 'content': "This product is terrible. The image is completely warped and distorted. It looks like a fun house mirror. Basically unusable unless you want to hate what you're seeing. When I tried to CAREFULLY remove it by heating the adhesive, it not only tore huge chunks off my wall, it shattered. Doesn't it say several times on this listing that it's shatter-proof? Complete garbage.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than anticipated', 'author': 'Jessica', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Easy to install. I was just expecting them to be larger. I use them in the bathroom on the door. They work okay but the different sections have breaks in the image in the mirror', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty much as advertised.', 'author': 'MichaelRS', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I\'ve been using this in my gym shower for a full month now and this is my impressions of it based on that time period and usage.It\'s pretty much as advertised, but there are a couple of things that could be better.First let me say that somebody else gave this product one star because when they got it it was so foggy and unclear it was if it was 5 yards away in a fog bank with 3 yards of visibility.Well, the mirrors come with a thin protective plastic adhesive coating over them. You have to peel that thing off first by kind of picking at the edge to loosen it and then the rest just easily peels away to reveal the night reflective surface underneath. Maybe they should include a little slip of paper with a pictorial instruction related to that.But after that is off, as a mirror, it\'s just fine.However the type of plastic they use could be a little harder as it tends to take scratches easier than it might. The first time I used it I wrapped it up in my gym towel with my razor and toothbrush and some other harder plastic materials (not the blade of the razor) next to it and they left little scratches in it. But since then I\'ve have folded it in its own section of my gym towel and it\'s all been good. I\'ve even dropped it about three times onto the shower floor from a height of about 5ft and it seemed to suffer no particular feel effects.It would be good for camping if the "roughing it" part of the particular type of camping was not too rough. Otherwise I think it\'s a great safety mirror for the home gym or shower.Some people have complained that the reflective surface has been flaking off theirs, but I wonder if that\'s a defect in the product or more they\'re severe handling of it.Lastly I would say for the price it could be a dollar less OR they should at least include two of the wall suction cup hangers with it. Which for this one you have to order separately. In my gym there\'s a little metal shelf for your toiletries while you\'re in the shower that just happens to be a good heigth. So I just set it on that and prop it up against the wall and it works fine.Bottom line us, if you need a good safety mirror for your shower that\'s not going to be put through rough treatment on a daily basis, I think this is just fine. If there is no negative update to this at some future point you can assume it\'s been hanging in there well enough.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2022', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Magnifying Mirror, 10X & 20X & 30X Kits, Magnified Mirror 3.5" with Two Suction Cups, Travel Magnifying Mirror Set for Makeup, Mirror Magnifying Comes with Portable Storage Bag (Black)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for three magnification mirrors.', 'author': 'Cid Herman', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I remember reading someplace years ago that when it comes to mirrors and magnification, there's no set standard in the industry. I don't know if this is true or not, or if it used to be true but no longer is. I do know I believed it at the time because a mirror with 10X magnification could have wildly different magnification than another mirror with the same 10X label on it. The only way to really know what you were getting was to look at it and see if it had enough magnification for your purposes.\xa0The best way to get a handle on magnification always seems to be to compare different mirrors of different magnifications and see how they stack up. Obviously, that's not always practical, but with this 3 pack of FAHZON COMPACT MAGNIFYING MIRRORS, you can't NOT compare them. You get three mirrors in three different magnifications, 10X, 20X and 30X. They also come with suction cups and a travel pouch.\xa0Prepare to be amazed. This is an awesome deal for these three little travel mirrors. The one that has the highest magnification at 30X will allow you to see every hair on your eyebrow and know exactly which one you're plucking. At this magnification, it's really all you can see. There's a time when each of these three mirrors will be appropriate for whatever you need magnification for.\xa0You can clearly see the difference between each of the three magnifications. All three mirrors cost just slightly more than you might pay for one mirror at a brick-and-mortar store. And truthfully, I've never seen any mirror claim 30X magnification. You will undoubtedly see things you wish you hadn't with this product. And you'll pay very little for the privilege of doing so.\xa0Recommended!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I never knew I needed!', 'author': 'LB', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Wow Wow Wow -- there is absolutely nothing I wanted less than to see everything I saw with this 30x magnifying mirror -- which is exactly why I need it! I don't know how many times I have wrestled to find a hair that I can feel but can't see. Many of mine are practically transparent. The 30x mirror is showing me many hairs that I can't see that I Need To See! Hubby told me I had a hair under my nose the other evening. I couldn't feel or see it. When I finally found it using the 30x mirror ... Holy Cow! That thing was a healthy 1/2 inch long! I'm almost over the trauma.I have already been using a 10x magnify mirror for several years. I love it, and it's very helpful, but apparently it doesn't tell the whole story. The 20x mirror is probably what I'll use most in the future. The 10x is a great strength for putting on eye makeup or general 'inspection' purposes. The 30x is going to take some time to get used to holding at the correct distance (close!) and in the correct position so that fingers and tweezers don't get in the way. The 20x is a great intermediate and doesthe job well, without having to be right on top of it. But I know now that I don't want to be without any of the three!I'm very happy that this set comes with its own soft drawstring bag and cleaning cloth. It's actually a bit larger than needed, but I like that because I can include a soft face cloth or two when traveling and everything is conveniently together. I'll also keep the thin protective packing circles that fit exactly on the surface of each mirror.I call this set of mirrors a win-win-win!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Every Need', 'author': 'DeLeana Strohl', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered these FAHZON Magnifying Mirrors when it became harder to see the with the 15x magnifier I was using was getting hard to see as my vision has changed. I have only used the 20x and the 30x for my needs. I do not use my 15x any longer after using these higher magnifiers. I use these on my eyebrows and chin area between waxing. I am now able to capture more hairs in both areas. I tend to use the 20x for the chin area and the 30x for my eyebrows. I have used them suctioned to my bathroom mirror but it is not my preference. When I have used them suctioned to the mirror they have held well for the duration of my need. I have only used my 15x magnifier so that is all I can compare these to and they all have worked the same with equal suction. I found the price for these 3 (even though I do not use the 10x) to be more cost effective than if I were to buy a 20x and a 30x. Not sure about your area, but I have never seen a 30x in stores so that was another reason I made sure to get these. Highly recommend!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive clarity', 'author': 'Rochelle', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I currently use a 15x magnification mirror to apply my eye makeup. Sometimes I want more magnification (I am 58). So I decided to order this set of 10x, 20x, and 30x magnification mirrors. Wow was I surprised at the clarity of the magnification on each one of these mirrors! It was crystal clear. No shifting around to find the sweet spot that was not distorted. Any where on each mirror was crystal clear! They come with suction cups you can place on the back if you want. And it comes with a protective drawstring bag too. This is a great set of mirrors! They are marked on the back what each magnification is but honestly, it’s too small. So I used a black sharpie pen and wrote on the back of each one. Now I can see at a glance what magnification each mirror is much better.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars 100% recommend', 'author': 'Blake', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is an amazing set for the price, currently 6.99. I ignored the instruction email the seller sent when ordered, the mirrors weren't delivered until a long while later, but I remembered skimming it and it came in handy. When I first lifted up the mirror, I was upside down and immediately had a bad impression. But because instructions were sent so soon after ordering, I knew there had to be something about them. I held the mirrors closer to my face and it worked. They work. Perfectly. The suction cups are easy to install and stick as they should. One of these mirrors have been stuck to my bathroom mirror for a couple days now with no issues. 100% love", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Magnifying Mirrors', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This magnifying mirror set offers magnifications of 10x, 20x and 30x, therefore catering to all my grooming needs whether it's precise makeup application or eyebrow grooming. The mirrors are powerful and distortion free. In fact what you see with the 30x can be pretty scary, lol. The mirrors are compact and lightweight, They come with a small bag to safely carry them in and a cleaning cloth. They are great for travel and can easily be slipped into your pocket or handbag for easy access wherever you are. Each mirror is equipped with two strong suction cups that you install. Installation is a breeze and the mirror can be attached to any smooth surface.In summary, this Magnifying Mirror set offers unparalleled versatility, convenience, and precision, making it a must-have accessory for anyone.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great set of magnifying mirrors!', 'author': 'Jen76', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This set is great. All 3 mirrors are nice and make it easier to apply my makeup, tweeze my brows, etc. Includes a bag for carrying them and 6 optional suction cups (2 for each mirror) to use for mounting them. Lightweight and easy to travel with. Good price for all 3!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing', 'author': 'abbycat', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These mirrors are compact and works great. They are very useful to pull facial hair with tweezers. 10x, 20x, 30x each gives different view. They even came with a nice little drawstring bag to store these. Highly recommend this item.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality - Extreme Value', 'author': 'Starlight', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The media could not be loaded. This is a good-quality set of three close up mirrors. They look the same as the ones sold in retail stores, but at a fraction of the cost. It really is like getting three mirrors for less than the price of one. Plus, this set had a few included extras.5 Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️*See my unboxing video for more product details.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tweezing', 'author': 'Andrea8430', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These mirrors work an expected, this is so helpful for when you are aging and you start noticing little hairs, poking out of places that you don’t want to have them as a woman. Also, because you have different magnified strengths, you can really get a good view of what’s going on. I will say that you do have to get really close because otherwise the image would be upside down. But once I figured that out, all went smoothly.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': False}]

title: deweisn Folding Lighted Makeup Mirror with 72 LEDs 3 Colors Light Modes USB Rechargable 1800mA Batteries Portable Ultra Thin Compact Vanity Mirror Dimmable Travel Mirror
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror', 'author': 'L', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Perfect for use in applying makeup. Lightweight, folds flat (I don’t travel buy can see this being perfect for someone who does). Has a long lasting charge; have used to for three weeks now on a single charge and haven’t had to re-charge it yet. Like that is doesn’t use batteries and can charge it through USB cable, which it comes with (just need to use your own wall charger). There are three brightness options…although I generally just keep it on the brightest one. One I cannot go without now.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Best as an additional light source', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': "I bought this lighted mirror for a poorly-lit room where my makeup lives. title: Larger Shower Mirror Fogless for Shaving Mirror for Shower,11x8 inch Than Original,Unbreakable Deluxe Plexiglass Makeup Mirror,Largest Bathroom Wall Hanging,Handheld Camping,Anti Fog Free Suction
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Usefull product', 'author': 'John D.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Although it does fog, it clears easily and stays clear if I wipe with a bit of shave cream. happy with the cost and product.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Can I leave negative stars?? Not fog proof AT ALL. Totally useless/waste of money.', 'author': 'Jared', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'Very disappointed in this product. The reviews stated that it was actually fog free. Mine fogged up almost immediately the first use and now fogs up immediately with EVERY USE.Someone mentioned that the seller sent them a replacement that worked better than the first one. If they reach out to me and send one that works, I will gladly update my review.As for now, this product is totally USELESS and a complete waste of money. Do yourself a favor and buy something different.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Not a good product overall. Useable, but not ideal.', 'author': 'Parker', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'I know it\'s cheap, but shouldn\'t it still be in "new condition" when you receive it?**Mirror was quite scratched up already when I removed the plastic film. I complained and asked for a replacement. Amazon did replace it, but 2nd mirror is more scratched than the first one. It is apparent that they do not get the plastic covering immediately, and they become scratched at some point in storage, prior to the plastic protective cover being put on. So brand new but still scratched all to heck.**Ironically, the brand new unused "fog free" mirror is foggy just in its default reflection. So the mirror is foggy/dim prior to even using it.**Once used you will discover mirror is not fog free by any stretch of the imagination. It does not repel fog any more than a normal mirror. The only plus is that it is made for the shower, so you have a handy hanger to latch it on to. Overall, not really an improvement from using a regular mirror, other than the adhesive hanger/hook.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror', 'author': 'Eric (Gmail)', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This sis a great mirror for shaving in the shower, but as for the fogless i call BS. it does fog up, but spray it with water and its fine.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Always fogs up', 'author': 'Scott M', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'OK, I don’t know what I really expected from this mirror. It’s made out of cheap plastic, and the guy in the mirror is not so attractive. Fortunately, however, whenever I turn on the shower, the mirror fogs up, so I don’t have to look at him.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Shower mirror', 'author': 'Brenda Fulton', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Nice size and easy to put up but it states anti fog yet it fogs up so the anti fog is untrue but all in all it’s a great mirror and we would buy it again if we needed a mirror for the shower', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Not Fog Proof!', 'author': 'Melanie Medeiros', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'If I could leave zero stars I would, I bought this for the exact purpose of it not fogging up. It’s like any other mirror…it fogs. Wouldn’t recommend this at all. Wasted money on this terrible product', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect', 'author': 'Jay', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Works perfectly. Nice size too. For all those complaining that it fogs up when they use it...here is how to use a mirror in the shower to shave. Hold the mirror under the shower for about 10 seconds so that the mirror is the same temp as the air. Really simple. Having the mirror hang on a hook makes this very easy.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great price, but not packaged to avoid mirror damage', 'author': 'B.D.', 'rating': 4, 'content': "It works. It's big. It comes with a mount, but that was also an issue, because the mount is a sturdy metal that chipped the mirror (right side, near the bottom half) during shipping, but the chip's manageable. The mirror did come with a film to avoid scratching the mirror during shipping. Would've been 5 stars, if there was a little more care in packaging the mount with the mirror to avoid the mount chipping/ damaging the mirror.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Okay for the price', 'author': 'Mike Upchurch', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Okay for the price, does fog up easily when used in the shower.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Shatterproof Shower Mirror Fogless for Shaving(2 Pack,Larger 10.7x8 inch)43% Than Original,Unbreakable Deluxe Plexiglass Makeup Mirror,Largest Bathroom Wall Hanging,Portable Handheld Camping,Silver
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good deal for 2', 'author': 'Phur', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Likes:Nice sizeClearLight weightSmall hookDislikes:Not truly fog free, but serves it's purpose", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A great value for something I put off for way too long!', 'author': 'EnnEssE', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I read other reviews describing the mirror as "not fogless". So I wasn\'t surprised when it fogged up. And stayed fogged up. And refogged when wiped. And then, suddenly, out of nowhere, fogged up again. That said, fog being expected, it works like a real mirror. Yes, a REAL mirror! I like that it wont break if it falls, which it has already done and remained pristine. I can shave in the shower!I put getting a shower mirror off for so long, and I\'m very pleased with this inexpensive, break-proof solution.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars This is a pack of two plastic mirrors. They are NOT fogfree, but are nice and clear.', 'author': 'V. H Lok', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This pack of wo mirrors is nice. The mirrors are large, light and clear. I like the size. The mirror has a circular hole, which you would use to hang on the hooks that come with the mirror. These are by no means fogless, they WILL fog over in a shower. You can of course wipe the fog off. However, they were advertised as fog free and they are not.In the shower, I like that they are light and plastic so I don't have to worry about them falling and breaking into glass shards in the shower, or heavily landing on a toe.Some people claimed that the mirror is cloudy and you can't see your reflection. These people simply did not REMOVE THE PROTECTIVE FILM that the mirrors are shipped with. The film is clearly for scratch protection durinnig packaging. Just peel it off. It even tells you to do so. My mirrors are crystal clear.So one star off for claiming to be fog free and not being so.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Definitely NOT Fogless', 'author': 'Merlin330', 'rating': 3, 'content': "Actually this is a pretty good mirror. It's reflective, clear,and it doesn't break. It's a good mirror for any place you want to use it, except in the shower. It fogs. Every time. Even if you give it a swipe with soap or shampoo, the clarity only lasts for a minute or two and then fogs up again. Sadly, it's problematic as I shave in the shower, so if it's a shower mirror you want, keep looking.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Not fogless!', 'author': 'Jay Davis', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'The mirror is advertised as fogless and shatterproof. I will vouch for it likely being shatterproof, but it fogs up as soon as steam hits it. I constantly have to spray water on it so that I can see to shave. It fogs up almost immediately after I turn shower on and stays fogged up the entire time I am trying to shave. I should have spent more maybe and gotten better.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars If you don't have a mirror in the shower, you should get one", 'author': 'KK', 'rating': 5, 'content': "If you don't have a mirror in the shower, you should get one! It has been nice to have this mirror and see the areas that you may have missed when washing your hair, face, and body. If you run it under warm/hot water as followed by the directions, it helps prevent it from fogging up. If you don't run it under warm/hot water, then it may fog up as expected from any mirror.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Mirror', 'author': 'SimplySunshine', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mirror is just what I wanted. I read the reviews prior to ordering and would like to help clarify some of the negative comments. There is a film on the mirror for shipping purposes to prevent scratching. Do not place this mirror in your bathroom with the film still on it. It will cause the mirror to stay foggy looking from the steam in bathrooms. Steam makes the film adhere to the mirror. REMOVE the film before putting the mirror anywhere there is steam. As far as the clip for hanging, it is great. There is a protective film on it that makes it look unattractive (used). You need to remove it. I have actually ordered several for friends and they have no issues at all. Buy it! You won’t be disappointed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars It’s not fogless but…', 'author': 'Nelly', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love having a mirror in my shower I can see when I wash my face & hair. title: Magnifying Handheld Mirror Double Sided, 1X 15X Magnification Hand Mirror, Travel Folding Held Adjustable Rotation Pedestal Makeup Desk Vanity
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Such a surprisingly great little mirror', 'author': 'Clementhyme', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was worried it was going to be too small... or just one more super cheaply made mirror with a frustratingly poor design like so many others I've owned throughout the past twenty years or so. This one is on the small side, but don't let that fool you, it's still within the optimally functional range, so it's all good. The handle is sturdy and adjustable so as to be easily used as both a handheld and a countertop mirror. The grippy soft material gives it an overall quality feel that is substantial and altgough it is easily adjustable, it's not loose or floppy in any respect. The hinges have the perfect resistance, it stays where you want it, period. It can be easily hung on a hook out of the way for storage or you can adjust it and use it in an additional hands free mode off the countertop saving space. As I mentioned earlier, I was concerned over the size, especially since I tend to love a bigger mirror, it's honestly been just the right size for every use I've needed it for, plus it can reasonably fit in your luggage for travel. I guess those big mirrors were just compensating for what they lacked in functionality and design. It's been years since I've had a handheld mirror I've felt so good about, I'm genuinely happy I didn't let my reservations prevent me from owning and loving this great new addition to my routine", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size and functionality', 'author': 'bootlover', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like the quality of this item, the functionality and it's useful", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Magnification was excellent.', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The mirror is excellent for travel which is what I bought it for. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Mirror', 'author': 'Mike Williams', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with a Natural Bamboo Stand, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance and design. The clarity and distortion-free reflection of both sides are impressive, helping me achieve precise makeup application.360° Swivel:The 360-degree swivel feature is highly practical and allows me to adjust the mirror angle with ease. I can effortlessly switch between the two magnification levels or position the mirror to get the best lighting and angle for makeup application.Portability:The compact and portable design of this tabletop mirror is one of its most significant advantages. I often travel for work, and this mirror has become an essential travel companion. It fits neatly in my luggage, and the bamboo stand folds flat, making it easy to pack and carry along wherever I go.Versatility:While I primarily use this mirror for my makeup routine, its functionality extends beyond beauty tasks. I've found it useful for other activities, such as applying skincare products, shaving, or even using it as a desk mirror for quick touch-ups while working.Stability:The bamboo stand provides excellent stability, ensuring the mirror stays firmly in place on my tabletop or bathroom countertop. I never worry about it tipping over or slipping during use.Eco-Friendly Materials:As someone who values sustainability, I appreciate that this mirror incorporates natural bamboo in its design. It's refreshing to see a product that embraces eco-friendly materials without compromising on quality and aesthetics.Value for Money:Considering the mirror's exceptional build quality, functionality, and eco-friendly aspect, I believe it offers great value for the price. The durability and versatility of this mirror make it a worthwhile investment.In conclusion, the YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with Natural Bamboo Stand has become an integral part of my daily routine. Its combination of functionality, eco-friendliness, and elegant design make it stand out among other makeup mirrors on the market. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast, a frequent traveler, or someone who appreciates eco-conscious products, I highly recommend this mirror as a must-have addition to your beauty arsenal.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little countertop mirror', 'author': 'lisa katoff-price', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Looks great on my new white oak vanity with white quartz top. title: Kids Safety Shatterproof Mirror for Wall,Plastic Mirror Wall Mounted,Made of Unbreakable Acrylic Non-Glass,Thick 1/8",1Pcs 8"x8",Great for Bedroom Door Closet,Kids' Rooms Mirror
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good value when used correctly', 'author': 'wkrasl', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'First, these do not come with a hook, so you need to use whatever you can find that works, either a hook or a stand. I had a previous two-piece shower mirror that had a razor hook, so I just stand my new mirror up where a razor would go. See photo.Now, pay attention if you want to be happy: This mirror fogged up pretty quickly on my first use. But I remembered how my last mirror worked, removing it from that stand to fill a slot in the the back with hot water. So now, with this new mirror, the trick is to heat the BACK of the mirror by holding it in the hot shower water for about 15-30 seconds. It now stays fog free for the rest of my shower.Final note, also a lesson learned from my last mirror. Do not wait until water drops have dried on the face of your mirror over months and years of use. You will ruin the mirror trying to clean water spots off after they have dried. Instead, while drying your body, take a few seconds at the end of every shower to gently blot away the water drops while still wet.Enjoy!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED review!!!!!!!! Mirror still fog', 'author': 'Monica Farley', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mirror will still fog up while taking a shower. Even with a warm shower. And hooks are not provided for hanging.UPDATE: I was contacted by and promised a replacement mirror.WELL... I received my new mirror and Guess What???? The mirror does NOT fog, I had the water as hot as it could get and the mirror still did not fog. So I totally recommend this seller. They are very polite and kind', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars NOT FOGLESS', 'author': 'Lena', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'It foggs up. but good quality. title: Wall Mount Small Mirror, Brushed Black Metal Framed Rounded Corner Rectangular Makeup Mirror for Bathroom, Bedroom, Living Room (12" x 16",Black)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars True reflection, beautifully designed, good value for the price.', 'author': 'Jennis', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love how this turned out. It has a tiny seam where the metal end meet, pretty easy to install. Came with anchors in case the location doesn’t align with studs. I thought it was thoughtful for them to include mounting hardware. I ADDED some poster putty at the bottom of the mirror so when I clean it, it doesn’t move around. Before it would have a slight bounce when touched. Now it sits more firmly against the wall. LOVE THE SIZE! Smaller bathroom but 2 kids can see themselves in the morning getting ready. Sturdy, and a nice matte black is what I chose.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellet stylish mirror!', 'author': 'Susan E. Stout', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This mirror is amazing, especially for the price. It's stylish and sturdy. It completed my office bathroom project.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror', 'author': 'Off Gassing', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Exactly how I expected it to be. Good quality and looks great!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Takes Patience to Install Properly', 'author': 'BillAdams', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Installation can be a challenge. There are two keyholes on the back that slide over two screws mounted perfectly on your wall. It would be helpful if they had told me these facts:The outside measure of the mirror is 30 1/16 x 20 1/8. The frame of the mirror extends 5/16 above the backboard, and the keyhole is recessed into the backboard 1/8” but has a “bubble” on it to accept the screw head. So if you let the screw stick out of the wall by 7/16” it will fit into the keyhole and the mirror will hang. If the screw doesn’t stick out enough, it won’t clear the frame to reach the keyhole.The two keyholes are, for horizontal hanging, 20 1/8” center-to-center, which means even if you find a stud, you will still need a drywall anchor for the second hole (as studs are 16” apart). For vertical hanging, the keyholes are 10 ½ “ apart.The mirror comes with some drywall anchors and screws but they didn’t look adequate. The mirror weighs 10 lbs and to allow for stress on it during cleaning the glass, allow 15 lbs. So I bought a set of #6 drywall anchors and screws. I measured on the wall (with a level) where the holes should go. Bottom of the frame to the horizontal mounts is 15 ¼”.Drill pilot holes first with a 3/16” bit in case you’re lucky and hit a stud. I did. On the other hole, the pilot hole is about 5/16” to accept the anchor. When you put in your screws, you have to estimate the head extension 7/16 by eye. You can always screw in more, but you can’t screw out without ruining the anchor.Make the same keyhole measurements on the reflecting side of the mirror and mark the keyhole locations on the glass with lipstick or Vaseline. That helps you align the screws with the keyholes, a procedure that is otherwise blind. I put a few 3M sticky pads at the bottom of the mirror to fill the space between the frame and the backboard so it wouldn’t rattle.The mirror looks really classy. It’s a great product at a great price. But you do need a bit of patience to install it. I should have hired someone. Took me all afternoon.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Mirror', 'author': 'Brandon’s Playlist', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Came in 1 day, and easy to install, solid heavy and well made.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice', 'author': 'Butch', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Beautiful and very good quality. Love it. Recommended', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Defective peoduct', 'author': 'Sara Perkins', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Bought three of these mirrors. Each one had the aluminum frame detached from the mirror itself in multiple places and could be pulled away from the mirror so that at least an inch or more of space was visible. Short return window and a large restocking fee. Wish I’d never bought.EDIT: The company has worked with me to resolve this issue, and fully refunded the broken products.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great quality', 'author': 'Sara', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'sturdy, heavy quality. chic look with the black frame and rounded edges, definitely upgrades your whole bathroom look', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror- use own hardware!', 'author': 'Jamie Brown', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Arrived safely without any issues! No messy extra packaging which was a plus.I agree with other reviewers- the black frame does have a small split/seam from where it connects that can be mended on your own. It’s annoying to me but could easily be overlooked for others. I will be fixing it on my own.The hardware that comes with the mirror is not long enough. So be sure to use your own wall anchors and screws.It was a beast to hang because the mirror is NOT flush with the black border. Because of this, the mirror will stick out from the wall and will lay flush with the border, not the back of the mirror. As you can imagine, you then need to ensure your screws are sticking far enough out to catch the mirror, which is why the hardware that came with the mirror is not long enough.Overall 4/5 stars, looks great and I feel more secure using sturdier and longer screws that we had. I will be fixing the seam in the border as well.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed, would recommend', 'author': 'D.P.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'No Cracks: These mirrors are exactly what I was looking for. I ordered 5 of the 24x36 mirrors and they all came in perfect condition no cracks. (Shout out to the delivery people!)Frame: I read a few reviews that stated flimsy frame with a gap. The frame is metal and I have noticed it is hot glued to the frame better in some than others, so if your frame moves you could add some extra hot glue to secure it better. However overall once hung on the wall I don’t expect any issues. Also, there was a gap mentioned where the frame comes together is small and positioned at the top of each frame if you were to hang it vertical.Hanging kit: I do agree the screws/anchors provided to hang the mirror seem small, so to be safe I will be buying bigger ones.Packaging: Each mirror came individually wrapped and well packed. 10/10 would recommend', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I need the extra light and magnification', 'author': 'TI', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm 68 and have used various different lighted mirrors for decades. While I can't speak on the battery life just yet, the inclusion of a charging cord is a thoughtful touch. It adds to the convenience and ensures I can keep the mirror illuminated whenever needed. Overall, a stylish and functional addition to my makeup routine.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars GOOD, NOT GREAT', 'author': 'Kimberley Sanchez', 'rating': 3, 'content': "For the most part, I like this mirror. However, I do NOT like the fact it can be fully charged, nothing tou9ching it & it automatically turns itself off right in the middle of me putting my make-up on. It is very annoying that it continues to turn off without any logical reason to do so. Unless they improve the product to keep it from automatically turning itself off at random, I would not buy this again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super chic and great magnifying', 'author': 'Melissa Marchant', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Looks very elegant. Quality is great and it works very well. Great buy!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not very happy', 'author': 'Eric Kasum', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'It’s a pretty mirror, and it works good, but it has several things I don’t like. It says it can be extended to be higher, but at its full extension it’s less than 1 foot high, so it’s way too short. Our previous mirror was much higher. it has the on switch on the backside of the mirror. In other words you have to turn the mirror over to turn it on and then turn it over to use the magnification mirror. Bad design. Why not have the switch on the base? My old mirror had a finger touch base to turn the light on and off and I loved it. Also this mirror is too small. It’s much smaller than our previous mirror. The only problem is, the company that makes our previous Mirror stopped making it, so this looks like our best choice. It may have a longer lasting battery and that was a problem with my old mirror. it also has a modern charger cord, that’s a big plus. My old mirror had the old charger socket and it was really annoying. Pros and cons. I think I’d be happy if the on switch was on the magnifying mirror which is the one I use instead of the backside, which is really annoying to have to turn it over after you turn it on. I guess I’m spoiled because I loved my old mirror so much. Will you like it? You decide.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great vanity mirror!', 'author': 'Fillise', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this lighted makeup mirror, especially the 10x side. So many magnification mirrors are only little disks, but those of us in our 60s and up need the whole mirror! The lighting is an added bonus. Recommend wholeheartedly.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Low Vision Folks', 'author': 'JamVee', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I'm a low vision guy and had trouble shaving/trimming my beard etc., until I got this handy mirror. I have no place to put it except on the sink countertop. I'm 6' tall, and even with the stand extended all the way, I still have to bend over to look into the mirror.For traveling, I wouldn't recommend it, because it's a bit bulky and heavy to put in a suitcase!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for a small purse', 'author': 'jeff moses', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Fit well in my purse and was able to use for travel', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Small but powerful', 'author': 'HF', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Attached to my large mirror to help with putting on my makeup', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not able to use it like I had hoped.', 'author': '"cpc_pc431"', 'rating': 3, 'content': "If you need an extreme close-up view of your eye, this is perfect, however I think it's just too much magnification for such a compact sized mirror. You have to pretty much hold it 1-2 inches from your eye to get it in focus. In retrospect to my purchase, the mirror probably works great if you need it for eye makeup, or an eyelash in your eye lid, not so much for anything else.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars The mirror is great', 'author': 'user1234', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Mirror is great- it has suction cups on the back so I attach it to my 10x big mirror. Sending this back. No suction cups were included so there's no way to mount it. Also, the concave mirror really messes with your focus. This was unusable. Sending it back.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Unboxing video. Love the product!', 'author': 'Olivia G.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The media could not be loaded. After receiving the package, I had to read the ad again because I didn’t realize (or forgot) that tweezers would come with my mirror. I am so excited!What a great combo of high quality items at such a reasonable price!! The suction cups were easy to attach to the back of the mirror, but I don’t need them. I prefer to keep the mirror and tweezers in my drawer. When I use them to tweeze my eyebrows, I will hold the mirror in my hand. It’s also the perfect size to take when traveling so I can keep my eyebrows “salon fresh.”I’m happy to have purchased these products. If I ever lose them, I’ll come right back here to purchase them again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars nice size for travels', 'author': 'logical1', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I needed another magnifying mirror for my travel bag. This is the perfect size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror, not good tweezers', 'author': 'Zon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Mirror is as expected - nice magnification, lightweight with thin, plastic frame, slips into small makeup bag easily (which is where I’ve always kept a mirror like this). I recently dropped the one I’d had for many, many years, and the mirror shattered. This one is nearly an exact replacement. Local big box store currently only carries one with a small built in light (bulkier and the light is terrible), so I ordered this one, and am happy with it so far.Unfortunately, the tweezers, are not of very good quality. Although I wasn’t in need of them, I thought it would be nice to have an extra pair. However, after trying them, I will *not* be using them for personal care. I’m attaching a photo to compare the La Cross set I use (nearly daily) to these. The tweezers from this set have a flat, but rather sharp edge to the tips (grasping end), which causes more of a skin grab than just hair, and they pinch fat too easily. I tested them before the review, and although quite careful, I still feel irritation of the skin where I used these. It’s not simply because I was tweezing, as I pluck a hair or two from my brows almost daily, so I don’t get irritated like someone who isn’t accustomed to it. It’s solely because of the unrefined edge of these tweezers. When I took the photo of the two, side-by-side, it was evident why they feel so different. The La Cross pair are more angled on the inside and are polished, but still provide adequate grip. I hope the photo uploads at a decent enough quality to be able to see the differences. The ones from this set are on the left, and the La Cross set are on the right (you can see the paint wearing away from use).So, the ones that came with this set will be relegated to either the craft room or the tool box. I’m sure they’ll be useful in one of those places, as long as I’m careful to not gouge or scratch anything.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Magnifying not great', 'author': 'Lisa', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Maybe I’m just more blind than I thought but this feels more like 10x magnification than 20x. I do like the size though. Very nice for travel', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

I liked it to a point, right when it began to wander…', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Underrated.', 'author': 'TTT', 'rating': 5, 'content': "A truly excellent quality film. Underrated, It's a wonder why, how, I have not heard of this before? My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed the film.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Reflection of Fear', 'author': 'Santeria', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I saw the Theatrical version the first weekend out and thoroughly enjoyed MIRRORS.I did feel that something was missing, and once again the Unrated Version has proven to be the gold standard.MIRRORS UNRATED packages both the Theatrical and the Unrated together, so you can see the two edits of the film on the same disk.Fabulously Eerie with its supernatural elements, the story brings you through the experience as we come to the final terrifying twist in the story. The disk is made for a 5.1 setup with its great audio, and specifically its ghostly audio that adds much to its spectacularly spookiness. Kiefer's performance brings up a brilliant scare. Its an excellent watch.DVD: Great extras.I don't agree with the deletes but thats the fun of the movies. The making of show a great deal of how this scare-fest was put together. HAVE FUN !!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2009', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars srorriM', 'author': 'Franci', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is probably not the most brilliant and original film, not to mention a couple of plot holes in it. I wasn't looking for the most brilliant and original story, and those minor holes imo were a way of leaving some things up to the viewer, for your own imagination. I'm really into creepy atmosphere and something that toys with the psyche and then leaves it up to me to figure some things out, suspense. This had all those elements. It's also an interesting storyline with a couple twists. There's really good acting, makeup and effects, and cinematography (not to mention I'm a Kiefer fan).In my opinion it's 4.5 stars.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2009', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars What does one see?', 'author': 'Sarah H.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This was a spooky movie.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars The Unrated Version is "The Definitive" Version', 'author': 'Dyers_Eve', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I rented this and it was pretty cool but a few scenes bugged me and I kinda laughed at how fake the fire looked in one scene in particular.The I said what the heck and bought it. I was surprised the version I'd seen was NOT the unrated version. I'll be honest the bath tub scene and the sheer scariness and brutality of it was enough to get me to purchase this dvd and for that I am not dissapointed, despite several flaw in both the script, the story and the effects. The thing that bothers me the most is this movie had the potential to be truly terrifying. From the trailer I saw it had potential written all over it and things got kinda fumbled on the potential part but i still an entertaining film thanks to Keifer and Amy Smart.If you had gotten to know his sister more, and really like her, perhaps she coudlve even had a bigger part? then the bathtub scene would have been that much more tramatic and gruesome and have garnered Keifer a bit more sympathy from us movie watchers. There's no reason at all togo with the theatrical version...Pity...", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2009', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Square Wall Mirrors for Bedroom Door, Unbreakable Full Length Shatterproof Mirror Tiles, 10"x10", 4 Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It Has TWO Layers of Protective Film - Remove Both!', 'author': 'Gardyloo', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is a large unbreakable mirror that can be set at any height you need. When I first tried this, I peeled off one layer of protective film. We installed it in the shower to shave my face. It didn’t fog up, but the image wasn’t completely clear. Then I read a review of a similar item that reported TWO layers of film. They were right, there are TWO layers of film, and removing the second layer makes this easy to view. Images are now clear, and I can shave safely in the shower. Highly recommended item!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Does What it Needs', 'author': 'Onyx', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I have this weird problem where every few days while showering I get an eyelash in my eye and I have to spend the rest of the shower with an eye closed. Figure why not get a mirror to help me get it out?I didn't do any cleaning on the tile wall before I stuck it on and it hasn't fallen off after a few weeks. I've let all kinds of soap and water get on it and haven't wiped it down or anything and it's still perfectly clear enough for me to see. Does exactly what I needed to do and my super small inconvenience is no problem anymore.Also weird to see myself in the various stages of soaps in my hair, ears, face.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 11, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars It's a mirror but it has a slight haze.", 'author': 'G. Parks', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Update: I increased the star rating. I noticed that there was an additional protection film on the mirror that was really difficult to catch an edge and remove. Once I removed that, the mirror is now much better.It works for my intended usage but it haze a slight haze. I did take off the protective plastic and even tried cleaning it. Don't expect a glass mirror reflection.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Shatterproof', 'author': 'kitty', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My old mirror fell and shattered at my feet after the suction cup became loose. This mirror will not shatter. its made out of some sort of plastic that resembles the back of a coaches clipboard. It has a wide, crystal clear view that has not fogged or gotten any signs of hard water stain on it since i began using it', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I can see when I shave!', 'author': 'The Miller Bunch', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I never gave it much thought before, but after seeing this shower mirror and picking it up I'm now wondering why I never thought about getting one before. I always shave in the shower, and then I would sometimes get out and noticed that I missed a spot and have to touch up once I was already drying off. But no more! This mirror is about the size of a sheet of paper, is as clear as a bell, and didn't actually fog up while I showered. It comes with a hook that sticks to the shower wall (clean and dry first of course), and so far it has held up fine. I love it! One thing I will mention. Mine came with 2 coatings of that thin, invisible plastic that you have to peel off. Once I did it was perfect.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Its Huge!', 'author': 'Powers', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My old one is starting to see the end of its life. Not realizing how much bigger it is than the one I have!So far the material is really good and the reflective surface is better than most glass mirrors. The backing feels like a solid plastic and doesn\'t appear to scratch off.Also with it being shatter proof. It doesn\'t have to stay in the bathroom! It could go out to the garage with you to find that 10mm socket, it could go to the basement so you can see around up into that thing they call a crawl space even though a newborn would struggle to fit in there, etc. The possibilities are only limited by the wife!Overall:Pretty good upgrade to replace my old one!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Delivers function with safety,', 'author': 'Sybarite', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This hanging shower mirror is a two piece unit. Thanks to the plexiglass fabrication, this lightweight mirror will not shatter with a fall and provides a clear reflection to work from. I would definitely seek this mirror out again as an option to mirrors for the shower.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick', 'author': 'The Honest Review Guy', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This works out pretty well. Gollnick', 'rating': 1, 'content': "Review updated in April 2022 after re-purchasing this item from the same Amazon listing I purchased four times head back in 2016:I bought one of these back in 2016 and was so impressed, I bought several more. You can read my original review below.But the ones I just got (2022) are not the same product. The 2016 ones had good quality metal and a real glass mirror. They tilted a scale at 4oz. The new ones have thin, flimsy metal and a plastic mirror. They weigh only 1.75 ounces. It’s the same ASIN (Amazon catalog number) but not the same product. Too bad. These were nice. Now they’re poor-quality junk.Why does China do this? They had a great product. But they tried to cut costs to make a few more cents off of it and now they have a product not worth buying. So sad.And I’m frustrated that Amazon permits such a significant change to the product while still allowing it to be sold under the same listing.——————————-Original 2016 ReviewThis is nice. It's a real glass mirror that gives a good, clean, bright, detailed, color-correct reflection in a nice metal case. It's a bit large for pocket-carry, but it's big enough to actually shave with. It is glass and will, if you drop it, I'm sure, break. But it's durable enough for common use. Being glass, it is a bit heavy, about four ounces, a quarter-pound, but it is a real glass mirror with all of the advantages of one.Be aware that it does come directly from China, so, while it shipped within a few hours of placing the order, it does still take a few weeks to come.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Slim enough to fit in a smaller handbag', 'author': 'JCMH', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I like the clarity of the mirror, the lightweight stainless brushed steel construction, even sent one to my niece who will use it when she is on a gig.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money due to the size', 'author': 'Suzender Benn', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'Not worth the money, but it will work for traveling.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Kids Safety Shatterproof Mirror for Wall,Plastic Mirror Wall Mounted,Made of Unbreakable Acrylic Non-Glass,Thick 1/8",1Pcs 8"x8",Great for Bedroom Door Closet,Kids' Rooms Mirror
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good value when used correctly', 'author': 'wkrasl', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'First, these do not come with a hook, so you need to use whatever you can find that works, either a hook or a stand. I had a previous two-piece shower mirror that had a razor hook, so I just stand my new mirror up where a razor would go. See photo.Now, pay attention if you want to be happy: This mirror fogged up pretty quickly on my first use. But I remembered how my last mirror worked, removing it from that stand to fill a slot in the the back with hot water. So now, with this new mirror, the trick is to heat the BACK of the mirror by holding it in the hot shower water for about 15-30 seconds. It now stays fog free for the rest of my shower.Final note, also a lesson learned from my last mirror. Do not wait until water drops have dried on the face of your mirror over months and years of use. You will ruin the mirror trying to clean water spots off after they have dried. Instead, while drying your body, take a few seconds at the end of every shower to gently blot away the water drops while still wet.Enjoy!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED review!!!!!!!! Mirror still fog', 'author': 'Monica Farley', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mirror will still fog up while taking a shower. Even with a warm shower. And hooks are not provided for hanging.UPDATE: I was contacted by and promised a replacement mirror.WELL... I received my new mirror and Guess What???? The mirror does NOT fog, I had the water as hot as it could get and the mirror still did not fog. So I totally recommend this seller. They are very polite and kind', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars NOT FOGLESS', 'author': 'Lena', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'It foggs up. but good quality. title: YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with Natural Bamboo Stand,8 Inch 1X/3X Magnification Double Sided 360 Degree Swivel Magnifying Mirror,Portable Table Desk Countertop Mirror Bathroom Shaving Make Up Mirror
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Mirror', 'author': 'Mike Williams', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with a Natural Bamboo Stand, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance and design. The combination of the sleek, modern mirror design with the natural bamboo stand gives it a touch of elegance and eco-friendliness. The bamboo stand feels sturdy and well-crafted, adding a sense of durability to the overall product.Mirror Functionality:The mirror offers both 1X and 3X magnification, making it versatile for various makeup needs. The 1X side is perfect for an overall view, while the 3X magnification allows for detailed work like applying eyeliner, plucking eyebrows, or perfecting intricate makeup looks. The clarity and distortion-free reflection of both sides are impressive, helping me achieve precise makeup application.360° Swivel:The 360-degree swivel feature is highly practical and allows me to adjust the mirror angle with ease. I can effortlessly switch between the two magnification levels or position the mirror to get the best lighting and angle for makeup application.Portability:The compact and portable design of this tabletop mirror is one of its most significant advantages. I often travel for work, and this mirror has become an essential travel companion. It fits neatly in my luggage, and the bamboo stand folds flat, making it easy to pack and carry along wherever I go.Versatility:While I primarily use this mirror for my makeup routine, its functionality extends beyond beauty tasks. I've found it useful for other activities, such as applying skincare products, shaving, or even using it as a desk mirror for quick touch-ups while working.Stability:The bamboo stand provides excellent stability, ensuring the mirror stays firmly in place on my tabletop or bathroom countertop. I never worry about it tipping over or slipping during use.Eco-Friendly Materials:As someone who values sustainability, I appreciate that this mirror incorporates natural bamboo in its design. It's refreshing to see a product that embraces eco-friendly materials without compromising on quality and aesthetics.Value for Money:Considering the mirror's exceptional build quality, functionality, and eco-friendly aspect, I believe it offers great value for the price. The durability and versatility of this mirror make it a worthwhile investment.In conclusion, the YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with Natural Bamboo Stand has become an integral part of my daily routine. Its combination of functionality, eco-friendliness, and elegant design make it stand out among other makeup mirrors on the market. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast, a frequent traveler, or someone who appreciates eco-conscious products, I highly recommend this mirror as a must-have addition to your beauty arsenal.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little countertop mirror', 'author': 'lisa katoff-price', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Looks great on my new white oak vanity with white quartz top. And they stay open perfectly.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars This is No Longer Nice', 'author': 'C. Gollnick', 'rating': 1, 'content': "Review updated in April 2022 after re-purchasing this item from the same Amazon listing I purchased four times head back in 2016:I bought one of these back in 2016 and was so impressed, I bought several more. You can read my original review below.But the ones I just got (2022) are not the same product. The 2016 ones had good quality metal and a real glass mirror. They tilted a scale at 4oz. The new ones have thin, flimsy metal and a plastic mirror. They weigh only 1.75 ounces. It’s the same ASIN (Amazon catalog number) but not the same product. Too bad. These were nice. Now they’re poor-quality junk.Why does China do this? They had a great product. But they tried to cut costs to make a few more cents off of it and now they have a product not worth buying. So sad.And I’m frustrated that Amazon permits such a significant change to the product while still allowing it to be sold under the same listing.——————————-Original 2016 ReviewThis is nice. It's a real glass mirror that gives a good, clean, bright, detailed, color-correct reflection in a nice metal case. It's a bit large for pocket-carry, but it's big enough to actually shave with. It is glass and will, if you drop it, I'm sure, break. But it's durable enough for common use. Being glass, it is a bit heavy, about four ounces, a quarter-pound, but it is a real glass mirror with all of the advantages of one.Be aware that it does come directly from China, so, while it shipped within a few hours of placing the order, it does still take a few weeks to come.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Slim enough to fit in a smaller handbag', 'author': 'JCMH', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I like the clarity of the mirror, the lightweight stainless brushed steel construction, even sent one to my niece who will use it when she is on a gig.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money due to the size', 'author': 'Suzender Benn', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'Not worth the money, but it will work for traveling.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 14 Bulb Dimmable Hollywood Makeup Mirror Lights, 22Ft Adjustable Vanity Lighting Fixtures for Full Length Mirror (Mirror Not Included)
reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Precisely What I've Been Looking For!", 'author': 'Tay', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I\'ve always loved that bright Hollywood-style makeup vanity look. Finding a vanity set in the right style and size with a lighted tri-fold mirror was near impossible to find in a price range that I was willing to pay. This set of wired globes was exactly the finishing touch that I needed for the secondhand vanity that I refurbished for my 6-year-old\'s "Princess Palace" style bedroom.First off, don\'t be in a rush to remove the lights from the box system. Take your time with this process to avoid tangling and losing your place. I located the power end first, then worked my way to the other end.Before adhering the lights to the mirror, I carefully draped them in a single line over my right shoulder since I was working from right to left. This kept them from bunching and clanging together. Having a good helper for this part would be great too.Next, I would suggest plugging the lights in before installing to make sure they are all working properly. Depending on where the outlet that you are going to use for setup is located, it would be a good idea to start your installation from the power end so that you can be sure that the plug\'s reach, the power button, and the positioning of the first bulb on that end are to your liking.Installing the lights took some time, patience, and careful planning. What I found helpful was to map out the arrangement with pieces of painter\'s tape for correct spacing. During the installation process, I quickly found the suction cups to work much better than expected. They stick very firmly but can be removed and reset if adjustments are needed. I would advise giving them a lighter press until you have achieved the placement that you desire, then go back around and press them more firmly. As I placed each bulb, I wrapped some of the wire around the base, being sure that wherever I stopped wrapping would be on whichever side was the closest edge of the mirror. That way, when I would place the following bulb, I could tuck the excess between the joints where the mirrors folded. I preferred this method to only winding the wires and having them show on top of the mirrors. The method I used created a much cleaner look, where the wiring is almost undetectable (as shown in the 2nd photo). Also, the hinges between the mirrors made for good anchoring points. I continued this pattern of sticking, winding, and tucking until the last bulb was in place.When my daughter came home from her weekend away, she was thrilled to see that her vanity lights were installed and ready to illuminate her smiling face. We both love the many levels of adjustable brightness that be achieved by pressing and holding through the 10 stages. We tend to keep them somewhere in the middle. When you turn the lights off they remember your last setting. So it\'s nice not having to reset the brightness each time. Only a light touch is needed to activate/deactivate the lights and because I placed the button on the vanity between the right-most mirror and her perfume tray, she is able to easily access it by herself, without it being in the way of her primping. Now when she plays with her pretend makeup, she has optimal lighting and as soon as I finish making her vanity seat, she will no longer need to sit on her toilet lid to get her hair done.This has been a super purchase! The quality is everything that I had hoped for and for a terrific price. Once I find the right makeup vanity for myself, I will surely be back to purchase another set.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 28, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, quick vanity.', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These were easy to put on and look amazing! Three modes and can turn the brightness up and down. Everything’s as described and would definitely recommend.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great lights!', 'author': 'Karen.A', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Good quality, great lighting, easy to install!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Nice', 'author': 'carlos', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Came on time and as expected, I love the brightness. My only complaint is that when installing, if you don't want the cord in between each light to be dangling depending on spacing, you have to wrap around bottom of the bases. Once I realized that it was a little easier, but you really have to play with it.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed', 'author': 'LaureeG', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These bulbs work exactly as advertised. Easy to space out and apply. I could use a tad more light but they’re working very well. Perfect solution and a good price.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every dollar', 'author': 'Lory Lopez', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The media could not be loaded. Best light I’ve ever had. I’ve had these 3 years the bulbs were super bright. I would have them on for hours and the bulbs never got hot. I had to replace them because unfortunately the wire came unattached from the bulb that made the whole thing work. I wish I could of gotten them replaced for free but it’s ok I’ll keep spending the money for these. Definitely used them all the time. Now I need a new carpet to sit on. Lol! I’ll guarantee you’ll love these bulbs. Clean the area with alcohol let it completely dry then attach the lights. I never never ever had to use the extra bulb adhesive stickers. As you can see in my video.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Hello gorgeous!', 'author': 'kat P.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The vanity mirror was so dark it was hard to do my make up, I wanted the make up mirror look without paying for a full upgrade.
